title: Where's bitcoin headed? MarketWatch gathers pros to discuss the outlook for crypto. Sign up!
text:
Nasdaq edges higher as investors weigh earnings from tech and other corporate heavyweights

On the heels of another record session for the Dow and S&P 500, stocks trade flat to slightly higher Wednesday as investors sift through a heavy slate of corporate results. See full story.

What's in — and not in — Democrats' big social-spending bill, as billionaire tax hits resistance

As the Democratic party tries to reach agreement, here are key proposed categories for the spending. See full story.

Here's what it will take to resolve the supply-chain disruptions roiling the U.S. economy

Here is a road map for how supply-chain disruptions will get resolved. See full story.

Apple's ‘ad-mageddon' is affecting Snap, Facebook, Google and Twitter differently

Alphabet Inc.'s Google and Twitter Inc. managed to avoid bigger hits to their revenue in the third quarter from the privacy changes by Apple, with both companies noting that they experienced modest impacts. See full story.

MARKETWATCH PERSONAL FINANCE

‘My mom is not involved in this decision because she has delegated signing authority for the account to this sister and my brother.' See full story.
